author: Staff Reporter
text:
Government employees of various state government departments and a section of teachers, insisting on their 20-point demand, staged a road roko in Tiruvannamalai and Cheyyar on Monday.

In Tiruvannamalai the protest was held in front of the Anna Statue.

District President of Tamil Nadu Government Employees Association (TNGEA) M. Thangaraj led the protest. As many as 1,176 protesters including 614 women were arrested.

In Cheyyar, 543 protesters including 330 women who staged a road roko were arrested.

Teachers belonging to Tamil Nadu Arambappalli Asiriyar Koottani, an assoiciation of primary school teachers also joined the strike and staged a road roko.
title: 1719 government employees court arrest
